ingredients.ingredient: 2 (8 ounce) packages reduced-fat cream cheese, softened
1 (4 ounce) can chopped green chilies, drained
2 ounces canned diced jalapeno peppers, drained

cookingTips: Drain canned peppers well to prevent excess liquid in the spread
Mix all ingredients until smooth and creamy
Bake until bubbly around the edges and serve warm with tortilla chips or vegetables
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Guide the user in preparing a creamy jalapeño popper dip using reduced-fat cream cheese and light mayo. Emphasize the balance of heat and cooling elements.
